HTML â†’ Lynx Renderer parses HTML into a semantic intermediate representation
(LynxNode), then renders it into Lynx native components.

It is not a browser, but a native-oriented, safe HTML rendering solution,
suitable for:

 * Content & detail pages
 * Rich text rendering
 * Configuration-driven pages
